verbose.description: Whether to run the command with verbose logging

flavor.description: The flavor to run from the flavors object

flavors.description: The different flavors to deploy, keyed by the flavor name and value is the firebase project id

envFiles.description: The different env files to use, keyed by the flavor name and value is the env file path

production.description: Whether to deploy the production flavor

development.description: Whether to deploy the development flavor

packageManager.description: The package manager to use for deploying with firebase-tools

tsconfig.description: The tsconfig file to use for the build
